metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11737 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libtskfs.a in The Sleuth Kit (TSK) from release4.0.2 through to 4.6.1. An out-of-bounds read of a memory region was foundin the function ntfs_fix_idxrec in tsk/fs/ntfs_dent.cpp which could beleveraged by an attacker to disclose information or manipulated to readfrom unmapped memory causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
